channel.title: Personal website of Guillaume Coqueret

item.title: About me
item.description: Webpage I am an associate professor of Finance & Data Science at emlyon business school. My research interests revolve around applications of numerical methods in various fields (financial economics mostly). Some of my recent work focuses on supervised learning and on sustainable equity investing. Academic positions Associate Professor of Finance, emlyon business school (Sept.Â 2018 - Present) Assistant Professor of Finance, Montpellier Business School (Aug.
